title: Lifehack
description: She lost her brother.She learnt to fight a legion of the dead.She spent two years alone, scavenging to survive.Then to make things difficult, she fell in love with a straight girl.Regan Grier, assumed dead, faces a city of walking corpses in which she struggles to find her brother. Her hopeless efforts meet some unsolicited help after two years.Enter Captain Alisia Terone. Intent on rescuing Regan from the city, stumbles on an unforeseen hazard: Regan's love.Regan's problems intertwine with Alisia's as they hunt the source of the technologically driven zombies, and cope with Regan's love for the inconveniently straight Captain.
author: Joseph Picard
